name: Simple Game Design Pipeline
description: Lightweight design pipeline for simple games. Produces design docs, then hands off to feature implementer for actual game code. No backend needed.

stages.name: System Designer
stages.description: Identifies core game mechanics and minimal systems needed

stages.name: Design Reviewer
stages.description: Reviews and validates the game design for completeness and implementation-readiness

stages.name: Design Documenter
stages.description: Writes the approved design to markdown files for implementation

flow.description: 3-stage design flow: design -> review -> document. No backend - actual game code built by feature implementer.

connections.description: DESIGN COMPLETE - Files written, ready for feature implementer

example_prompts: A simple tic-tac-toe game with nice graphics

metadata.recommended_for: Simple single-mechanic games, prototypes, game jams, board games
metadata.notes: Design only - no backend code. Actual game built by game-feature-implementer-v2.
